msItem.title: Sair al-Bilad.
msItem.note: F1a: a) Signature of Ellis, dated 16.12.08. b) Signature, C.A. Storey c) In Ellis's hand: Luzac (Raverty). Front flyleaf, recto, pasted slip with handwritten description of the manuscript, the price ƒê2 and the number E(llis?) 72. Front flyleaf, verso, price 30/-. An account of travels in N. India the Punjab and Afghanistan, undertaken in the 1790s on behalf of Lieut.-Col. Francis Wilford. This MS contains the introduction and the last two sections of 4. Headings and punctuation in red.

bindingDesc.p: English half-leather and marbled paper binding.

origin.p: The village of Tarrington? in England. A.H. 1284, A.D. 1867.

acquisition.p: Bequest of C.A. Storey, presumably. Formerly in the Library of Major H.G. Raverty.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
